welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Hanover, where charming small-town vibes meet big city opportunities. Known for its historic landmarks and delicious food scene, we invite you to explore and indulge in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as the main terminal for most of the major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Operates as a hub for United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is reserved for private charter flights and corporate jets.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the smallest of the three terminals at LaGuardia Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is currently undergoing a major renovation and expansion project.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the largest of the three terminals at LaGuardia Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport, with no time or data limit.
